---
apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations: {}
  labels:
    app: mariadb
    group: cloud-test
    tier: backend
  name: mariadb
  namespace: cloud-test
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mariadb
      group: cloud-test
      tier: backend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mariadb
        group: cloud-test
        tier: backend
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - preference:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: group
                operator: In
                values:
                - cloud-test
            weight: 10
        podAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: group
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - cloud-test
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD
          value: 'no'
        - name: MARIADB_ROOT_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: root_user
              name: db
        - name: MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: root_password
              name: db
        - name: MARIADB_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: owncloud_db
              name: db
        - name: MARIADB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: owncloud_user
              name: db
        - name: MARIADB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: owncloud_password
              name: db
        image: bitnami/mariadb:latest
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 60
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3306
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: mariadb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - "/bin/sh"
            - "-i"
            - "-c"
            - MYSQL_PWD="$MARIADB_PASSWORD" mysql -h 127.0.0.1 -u $MARIADB_USER -D $MARIADB_DATABASE -e 'SELECT 1'
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 60
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 0
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: "/bitnami/mariadb"
          name: cloud-test
          subPath: mariadb
      restartPolicy: Always
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: dedicated
        operator: Equal
        value: web
      volumes:
      - name: cloud-test
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: cloud-test
